trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Chambersburg
There was one other sighting in Chambersburg on or around October 17th 2012
divs: sighting detailsmy boyfriend called me from his house,said there was something weird glowing in the sky. this was at 4:30 pm in chambersburg pa. i got to his house about 5:00pm and it was still there. he had started recording it when he saw it. he also had a friend on the phone who was also looking at it. it would get really bright then disapear and come back every min it seemed. it stayed there till about 5:30\45pm when we saw a plain and it seemed to not come back after that! it was crazy, never saw anything like it before!!! it also seemed to be very shiny and tube like.
Summary: Saw something super bright and it would disapear and come back, Happened for about and hr. got it on video!!
